description.p: This release adds the following features:

ul.li: Display device name for camera ID on Linux
Don't store data in temporary location by default
Update screenshots
Add Flatpak bundle build recipe
Validate & augment metainfo file using appstreamcli

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: Prevent in-tree builds
Give a better error when trying to build against GLES instead of OpenGL
cmake: Find more recent FFmpeg versions as well

ul.li: Implement z-stack capture feature for Miniscopes with an EWL
Run display image rendering as event loop callback

description.p: This release fixes the following bug:

ul.li: Resolve a few compiler warnings

description.p: This release adds the following feature:

ul.li: Make build instructions a bit more beginner-friendly

description.p: This release fixes the following bugs:
